Author: Soybeansandsprouts
Text: Hi thank you so much for the kind words . Itâ€™s so easy to get lost in your own head with an ED so it was very comforting to hear from you. :)

Author: xStingx
Text: Hey! At least you did not overdo it. I know maintenance is scary, trust me. But we fail to realize that with this illness,  it's okay to be okay. & maintenance is okay. I've been slipping up and eating at maintenance every so often and while it does suck & make me feel bad, I just remember that I did okay & that tomorrow is a new day. 12am starts a new day and you're back to 0 calories. Reset and aim for your goal.
